name: OnlineMedEd
description: CRUSH the boards and the wards on-the-go with OnlineMedEd Mobile.  At OnlineMedEd its our mission to make learning easier, faster and more reliable. Download our app now and access: 70+ hours of organized, high-yield content to get you prepared for the boards and the wards. 400+ pages of notes with diagrams, tables, tips and insight into topics. 1,200+ board style vignettes you can take by topic or mix and match to prepare for the test. 10,000+ flashcards to review and reinforce the most essential, high yield information.    Its fantastic. The perfect amount of information to learn or review challenging topics. -Student, Class of 2019 Weill Cornell Medical College  Great resource! This was my main resource for shelves and step 2. -Student, Class of 2018 Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences F. Edward Hebert School of Medicine  Concise, yet packed with ample amount of high yield info. I use it in conjunction with step up to medicine and UWORLD and its helped me destroy my shelf exams. -Student, Class of 2018 Royal College of Surgeons  LOVE it! OnlineMedEd helped me throughout my clinical year. I wish I had known about it earlier on in the year. -Student, Class of 2020 Alpert Medical School at Brown University   OnlineMedEd. Learn everything you need and nothing you dont.
